title: Charming Scottish Country Estate Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: On the coast of the idyllic West Highlands, surrounded by beautifully kept gardens, mature woodland, lochs and inlets, the quintessentially Scottish Isle of Eriska Hotel, Spa & Island has it all. Proudly a member of the Small Luxury Hotels Of The World, this boutique hotel offers only 32 guest rooms and suites to ensure serenity. Take a step back in time and discover countryside elegance with a stay in this Scottish Baronial mansion, which boasts grand open fireplaces, lofty ceilings and charming tartan furnishings. Savour sustainable fare and old-world wines, practise your swing at the driving range and embrace country living with countless outdoor activities, from nature walks to fly fishing.
location_description: Isle of Eriska Hotel, Spa & Island
